entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Dryden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:47 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -24.7°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries late this morning and early this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this morning. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 37 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
